article: It's seven in the morning. After  _  Mr White and Mrs White  _  their children to the school  _  the car. Then they go to work in a  _  . The children have lunch at school. Father and mother have lunch at the factory. There  _  four classes in the morning and two in the afternoon. After  _  the children play games for some time. Sometimes the children  _  the classroom with their classmates. Then they go home by school bus. Mother cooks supper for the  _  . The children help their mother do the housework. After supper the children do  their homework  . Father and mother watch TV or  do some reading  .
